metadata.description: Advanced optimization tools for Claude Code - 9 specialized solvers for allocation, scheduling, portfolio, network flow, Pareto analysis, stochastic programming, and column generation

plugins.name: optimization-mcp
plugins.description: Production-ready optimization MCP with 9 specialized tools: resource allocation, robust optimization, portfolio optimization, project scheduling, network flow (10-100x faster), Pareto frontier analysis, 2-stage stochastic programming, and column generation for large-scale problems. Built with PuLP, CVXPY, SciPy, and NetworkX.
